goal: Deloitte contributes in its long experience in working with the European institutions (in particular the European Commission) and in advising public and private organisations in strengthening their strategic positioning and their communication. Deloitte provides consulting services and tailor-made tools to decision-makers worldwide. Deloitte Sustainability offers multidisciplinary expertise in several key areas, among which: scientific and technical support in the environmental field; improving the science-policy interface; policy assessment; economic instruments and their interaction with environmental policy; integrated assessment modelling; and business strategies for sustainable development. From a thematic point of view, Deloitte contribute its knowledge on topics related to environmental legislation, particularly waste management and circular economy policies. Deloitte works for public authorities (European Commission, ) on wide range of environmental issues for the past 20 years, in particular on aspects related to ecodesign, sustainable consumption, product lifecycle, waste prevention, recycling and producer responsibility.
